publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4944 Rosie Kane: Camanachd Chooses Lifeâ€”That the Parliament recognises that in Scotland men are at greater risk of taking their own lives and that they have difficulty in accessing mental health services, especially in rural areas and therefore congratulates the Camanachd Association and all 53 shinty clubs affiliated to it for their initiative in working with NHS Highland and the Choose Life campaign to help to raise awareness of helplines and other assistance available to people at risk of suicide. Supported by: Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Chris Ballance*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4944 Camanachd Chooses Life (lodged on 11 October 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Tommy Sheridan*
